question:
The conspiracy to divide Bengal was aimed at
(a) To weaken the National Freedom Movement
(b) To break the Hindu-Muslim Unity
(c) To bring Hindu in minority in the new state
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
The following aspects were aimed at the conspiracy to divide Bengal.
(a) To weaken the National Freedom Movement
(b) To break the Hindu-Muslim Unity
(c) To bring Hindu in minority in the new state
